Cvars.help: Use (outside-of-Steam) code to communicate with master servers.

Cvars.name: sv_max_queries_sec

Cvars.name: sv_max_queries_sec_global

Cvars.help: Window over which to average queries per second averages.

Cvars.name: sv_max_usercmd_future_ticks

Cvars.name: sv_maxreplay

Cvars.name: sv_maxroutable

Cvars.name: sv_maxupdaterate

Cvars.name: sv_noclipfriction
Cvars.help: Friction during noclip move.

Cvars.help: Server password for entry into multiplayer games

Cvars.name: sv_pausable

Cvars.name: sv_pausable_dev_ds

Cvars.name: sv_permawipe

Cvars.name: sv_phys2_stats
Cvars.help: Dumps server physics stats

Cvars.name: sv_play_music
Cvars.help: Play some music through the music engine

Cvars.name: sv_playerperfhistorycount

Cvars.name: sv_soundscape_printdebuginfo
